info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: testphp.vulnweb.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Tue, 30 Dec 2025 10:35:21 GMT Server: nginx/1.19.0 X-Powered-By: PHP/5.6.40-38+ubuntu20.04.1+deb.sury.org+1 Home of Acunetix Art

About Us | Privacy Policy | Contact Us | Shop | HTTP Parameter Pollution | ©2019 Acunetix Ltd

Warning: This is not a real shop. This is an example PHP application, which is intentionally vulnerable to web attacks. It is intended to help you test Acunetix. It also helps you understand how developer errors and bad configuration may let someone break into your website. You can use it to test other tools and your manual hacking skills as well. Tip: Look for potential SQL Injections, Cross-site Scripting (XSS), and Cross-site Request Forgery (CSRF), and more.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: testphp.vulnweb.com' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Ubuntu; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/'

info.name: Nginx End-of-Life - Detect
author: shivam kamboj
info.description: Detected Nginx versions that have reached End-of-Life (EOL) and no longer receive security updates.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: testphp.vulnweb.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Debian; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/121.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Tue, 30 Dec 2025 10:35:30 GMT Server: nginx/1.19.0 X-Powered-By: PHP/5.6.40-38+ubuntu20.04.1+deb.sury.org+1 Home of Acunetix Art

info.name: Nginx version detect
author: philippedelteil
daffainfo
info.description: Some nginx servers have the version on the response header. Useful when you need to find specific CVEs on your targets.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: testphp.vulnweb.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Debian; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/121.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Tue, 30 Dec 2025 10:35:30 GMT Server: nginx/1.19.0 X-Powered-By: PHP/5.6.40-38+ubuntu20.04.1+deb.sury.org+1 Home of Acunetix Art
